= Introduction =

This tutorial walks through creating a *Desktop Application.*  This mode is provided for batch/scripts most commonly used on servers or mainframes.

----
= Installing Java =

Java 5 Runtime or higher is required on the clients to use jZebra as a web applet.  Click TutorialJavaInstall for help installing Java on your platform.
